author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jasco Electronics Says HY HEPS Decreased By 81 Pct
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Jasco Electronics Holdings Ltd:
* HY ‍PROFIT BEFORE INTEREST AND TAXATION (PBIT) WAS 1% DOWN AT R29,9 MILLION​
* ‍HEADLINE EARNINGS AND HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE DECREASED BY 81% TO R2,7 MILLION AND 81% TO 1,2 CENTS PER SHARE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
